subtitles.text: Hello, my name is Mao Iyoi.
Today, what a surprise, I'm here at the Nogizaka Costume Warehouse.
Um, I heard that none of the Nogizaka members have joined.
You just heard that, didn't you?
I'm too scared when I eat my pirate bento.
I can't believe I'm seeing this.
Wow, that oak closet is too big.
Now that's what I'm talking about.
I wonder if they have old ones.
We've never worn the ones before we came here.
I wore that skirt in my audition for the third season.
You know, the ones you were wearing before you floated?
It's the kind of skirt I used to wear.
The old ones were short, weren't they?
I've seen some of the older students wearing them.
It's got the Nogizaka logo on it.
It's not as big as it is now.
There were originally three sizes of emblems
There are three kinds of emblems originally.
I like it... it's what you want.
Wait, I didn't know there was a frill here.
I'm too scared to eat lunch with this one.
We pay attention to the names, don't we?
I was so happy to be able to wear my senior's dress.
I was so happy to be able to wear my seniors' clothes.
I was so excited, Mr. Ishio told me not to get excited.
I realized I had a crush on you.
I've always had a crush on you.
I'd like to try it on.
I have an image of them all together.
Taller girls are a little bit...
I wonder if it's because it's longer.
You know, I had a uniform for the first season.
I hadn't worn it in a while, and it was so short.
I wore it around the beginning.
It looks like there's a pattern to this, too.
I can't wait to find out.
Cicada? What do you call it?
This is where I've come from.
I've been here maybe once or...
When I was allowed to appear in Nogizaka Construction Workshops.
It's got this kind of texture.
It looks like it's been used a long time.
This is a little too rare.
I can't show it off at all.
Wow, the fabric is so different from before.
But I really can't eat this for dinner.
The first captain, Reika Sakurai, used to spill food all over it.
She even turned her bento over neatly in her uniform's lap.
I'll show you your guess at once.
It'll be great if you hit it.
It'd be great if I hit it.
But let's go out to eat.
When I was in this outfit...
They were doing a Valentine's Day show.
The Valentine's Day project... the third term students giving out the valentines.
I was really impressed with this outfit.
The gown maker told me not to sit on it too tight.
It would wrinkle up too much.
I had to hold it back while I danced.
We're going to hear more and more episodes of this uniform from here on out.
There's a Nogizaka logo on the button.
This one has a ribbon that goes clorin.
I always had to adjust it right up until the last minute.
I think it's a different one.
It's from the same time period.
It's the same time of year.
I was wearing short sleeves the other day.
Yeah, it's longer now that winter's here.
I remember when the older students wore these.
Oh, and this is Mr. Shiki.
Seeing it on film is totally different from seeing it in person like this, isn't it?
I wore this outfit when we were the same age.
I don't think she wears this much.
It's probably been a really long time.
I miss it. Is this the one with the "Despair" dance? We used to dance like that.
It's amazing to think that I have one of my own.
It's so different when you look at it up close.
This one looks like a piece of wood.
Isn't this one with a lot of buttons?
Oh! I thought it wasn't closed yet.
It's been a big part of my life lately.
I wore this a lot, too.
Ah! You wore this one, too, right?
Did you wear all the uniforms?
It was so cool when it went around.
I've never fallen out of the customary version.
We did this for that one, didn't we?
It's not a trigger. It's a good-bye.
There was a purple one, too.
Purple doesn't make much of an impression on me.
There are a lot of red ones.
The one Sanki wore when he went to Jingu.
You mean he called him Sun Wukong?
I don't think it's a costume.
You look like you can play basketball.
I look like I can play basketball.
I didn't know the article was like this.
Let's ask questions to the fans.
Who wore this outfit at what concert and when?
I wonder if I can touch it.
It's amazing to see something like this.
This block is like the title,
Wait. I've never seen this before.
That wig and everything is amazing, isn't it?
The wig is amazing, isn't it?
This is a mannequin in school uniform.
I was so happy when I put it on.
It's amazing that all the seniors who graduated are still here.
I like how it's a little transparent.
This is only for folded cotton, right?
I found Mukai-san over here, too.
You're kidding? Did you find it?
I'm close to Minami in height,
I'm often allowed to wear it.
I think this is the first time I've seen it in person.
I didn't know it was made of this kind of fabric.
Oh, it's a knock music video.
I want to wear it at the concert.
I wonder how it will look.
I want to wear it. I won't wear it.
I've never had one of these.

What was I wearing it with?
It has wings on its back.
Yakubo gave it to me on Instagram or something,
It's so cute. I love this outfit so much.
You took care of me on the tour, didn't you?
I wonder how many times I've worn it.
I was drenched by the rain.
It's true, isn't it? Drenched by the rain.

I thought it smelled like rain.
Yes, I was green in the music video.
I was Japanese green, wasn't I?
It's amazing. It has all these decorations.
I wore it the other day.
This is the one I wore at the M-Dump.
I can't get enough of it.
It's amazing. There's also this newest one.
I heard that not all of them are here.
I don't know what to do. What should I do?
I would like to introduce each of you one by one.
Yes, I'm wearing the polka-dot costume of Ms. Ikoma's solo song. I wore the polka-dot costume of Ikoma's solo song.
I thought I probably won't have a chance to wear it again,
I love polka dots, so I wore it.
And the light blue color is very Hazuki-like,
I was surprised to learn that you wear it like this.
She's so cute. She looks like a princess.
This is Ikoma's tight hugging outfit,
I don't think she wears it very often,
So I took this opportunity to try it on.
From a distance, it looks like Ikoma.
That's amazing. She is so cute.
I got to know Nogizaka because of Ikoma-san,
I tried on this outfit today.
I noticed that this is Ikoma from the period of unrequited love,
I don't think I have a chance to wear Ikoma in the past,
I came here to wear it,
Actually, this Ikoma is Mai Kudo's Ikoma.
It must have been the right size.
So, I went to the costume warehouse today.
I was able to see the history of Nogizaka, and nostalgic costumes,
I used to be a geek, so I was really excited.
But we had a lot of fun too.
It was a lot of fun.
First of all, here it is.
Do you know who this is?
The costume designer said it can hold two people.
Mr. Himura, you can wear it anytime.
The birthday concert will be held in a little while,
I'm sure the costumes you saw this time will be there,
